name: Runeswarm
description: The Runeswarm is a large construct composed of swirling runes, characterized by its exceptional agility and magical prowess.
memorable: It can unleash unpredictable magical effects through its Runecast ability, significantly influencing combat.
goals: To support allies and hinder enemies using its versatile magical effects.
relations: Related to other constructs, may be encountered with magical creatures due to its abilities.
environment: Typically found in magical locations or places where constructs are created.
strengths: High agility allows it to dodge attacks; extensive magical abilities enhance its combat versatility.
weaknesses: Low physical power and inability to regain hit points as a swarm can limit its endurance.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack with magical and melee components, including the Cutting Runes and Runecast abilities.
most_powerful_ability: Runecast, which can summon allies or deal elemental damage, among other magical effects.
senses: Possesses blindsight 60 ft., allowing it to perceive its surroundings despite being blind beyond that radius.
additional_information: Immunities to various conditions make it hard to control during combat.
Can share space with other creatures due to its swarm ability.
Effects from Runecast can significantly alter the battle dynamics.
Resistances to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage improve its durability.
Low Intelligence indicates a lack of tactical awareness.
test_queries: swarm with magical abilities and resistances
